results.overview: The children of a small European mountain village end up being its only residents, soon after the adults cannot take their behavior any longer.
results.title: Trouble at Timpetill

results.overview: Hansel and Gretel tells the tale of two young children driven from home by their scolding mother. Losing their way in the dark forest they stumble upon the cottage of a kindly old woman. But is this kindly old woman everything she seems...?
results.title: Hansel and Gretel

results.overview: Twenty-year-old Martin seems to be living the dream. After moving from the French countryside to Paris, he quickly found professional success as a fashion model and romantic fulfillment in dating his half-brother's fiery roommate, Alice. Deep down, however, he is avoiding inner turmoil that stems from his tumultuous upbringing. But when Alice becomes unexpectedly pregnant, the full force of his repression is let loose, wreaking havoc on his life.
results.title: Alice and Martin

results.overview: A vision of Colombia's inhuman armed conflict, seen through the eyes of a young - and pregnant - girl soldier.
results.title: Alias Maria

results.original_title: Si sospetta il movente passionale con l'aggravante dei futili motivi
results.overview: Giulia is ready to spend a weekend with Lucio. However, as she reaches the villa where they are supposed to meet, she doesn’t find him, but three unknown women instead. They are Lucio’s other lovers who, just like her, have received the same text message from him two days ago. The man is unreachable and they keep asking themselves one question: why did he want to bring them there?
results.title: Under Suspicion for a Crime of Passion Aggravated by Triviality

results.original_title: Al Pacino, le Bronx et la fureur
results.overview: Between the South Bronx and (New) Hollywood, a portrait of Al Pacino, passionate about theatre and mythical actor of The Godfather and Scarface, who has never stopped battling with his demons.
results.title: Becoming Al Pacino

results.overview: When a school girl disappears, suicide is suspected, and one of her classmates is suspected of having goaded her into it.
results.title: After My Death

results.overview: A 22-year-old factory worker lets loose on the weekends: drinking, brawling, and dating two women, one of whom is older and married.
results.title: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning

results.overview: A bank employee, shy and skittish, is falling into the web of fear of the events he sees around him and the crime wave that seems to invade the city.
results.title: Afraid to Go Out at Night

results.overview: Long-term couple Owen and Hallie are breaking up—or maybe not?—and just as their relationship reaches a turning point, Matt and Willa embark on a romance of their own.
results.title: In a Relationship

results.overview: During the Italian Renaissance, Pope Julius II contracts the influential artist Michelangelo to sculpt 40 statues for his tomb. When the pope changes his mind and asks the sculptor to paint a mural in the Sistine Chapel, Michelangelo doubts his painting skills and abandons the project. Divine inspiration returns Michelangelo to the mural, but his artistic vision clashes with the pope's demanding personality and threatens the success of the historic painting.
results.title: The Agony and the Ecstasy

results.overview: When Andrew Sterling, a successful black urbanite writer, buys a vacation home on a resort in New England the police mistake him for a burglar. After surrounding his home with armed men, Chief Tolliver realizes his mistake and to avoid the bad publicity offers a thief in his jail, Amos Odell a deal.
results.title: Amos & Andrew

results.overview: Henry VIII of England discards his wife, Katharine of Aragon, who has failed to produce a male heir, in favor of the young and beautiful Anne Boleyn.
results.title: Anne of the Thousand Days

results.overview: London, June 29th, 1613. The Globe Theater, ran by the famous playwright William Shakespeare, accidentally burns to ashes. Seriously affected, he stops writing and returns to his hometown, where his wife Anne and daughters Judith and Susanna get surprised to hear he intends to stay there definitively, after two decades working in the capital, neglecting his sincere affections for them.
results.title: All Is True

results.overview: After a hard day at work and a condominium-board meeting, accountant Ugo Fantozzi goes on a trip with his family. Unfortunately, he will face a nasty surprise upon his return.
results.title: Fantozzi Still Suffers

results.original_title: 猫と庄造と二人のをんな
results.overview: Shozo is plagued by the needs of his ex-wife and his current one, but prefers the company of his cat.
results.title: Shozo, a Cat and Two Women

results.overview: When bike courier Chris witnesses what looks like a murder, his first instinct is to cut and run. But when his curiosity draws him back in, he's soon embroiled in a world of corruption, political power, and illegal bike racing.
results.title: Alleycats

results.overview: Pino is a young man who lives in Assisi with his father Damiano, a communist revolutionary, and his partner Nadine. One day Pino sees Maria Teresa studying Latin and starts giving her some lessons. Soon they fall in love.
results.title: Do Not Commit Adultery

results.overview: Scandal erupts over a famous bullfighter's affair with a left-wing actress.
results.title: A Matador's Mistress

results.overview: After the sudden death of magazine publisher Colonel Ryder, his nephew, Tony inherits the magazine and has big plans to expand it. While negotiating a loan from the bank, Tony gets a call from a detective surrounding his uncle's death. It turns out Colonel Ryder died in his hotel room with a smile on his face and a young woman was seen fleeing his room wearing only a towel. Suspicious of this woman and afraid the magazine's wholesome image may be tarnished and their loan denied, Tony asks the detective to stick around and find her.
results.title: All in a Night's Work
